scripts.dev: concurrently -n 'backend,frontend' -c '#04FCF1,#9c143f' "cd backend && python manage.py runserver" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n 'backend,frontend' -c '#9c143f,#85590d' "cd backend && python manage.py runserver && npm run start" "cd next && npm run start"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.install:all: cd compose/local/django && pip install -r requirements.txt --user && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.start:all: gnome-terminal --window --title=JASMA-API -x sh -i -c "cd backend && python manage.py runserver" && gnome-terminal --window --title=JASMA-NEXT -x sh -i -c "cd frontend && npm run start"
